title: Agro Export Company
heroDescription: We provide premium sesame, coffee, pulses, and teff to international buyers.

hero.title: Premium Ethiopian Agricultural Exports
hero.subtitle: Supplying premium Ethiopian coffee, sesame seeds, pulses, and grains to international and Arab buyers.

about.label: About Us
about.title: Who We Are
about.description: HAC Export and Import is a premier Ethiopian agricultural exporter dedicated to providing high-quality sesame, coffee, pulses, and teff to Arab and international buyers. Our products are carefully sourced from the best regions, graded meticulously, and packaged according to international export standards. We pride ourselves on delivering consistency, reliability, and transparency in every shipment, ensuring our partners receive only the finest commodities. With years of experience and a commitment to excellence, HAC Export and Import continues to grow as a trusted supplier in global agricultural markets.
about.missionDesc: To provide premium Ethiopian agricultural products to international markets with consistent quality, reliability, and transparency.
about.visionDesc: To become a globally recognized and trusted exporter of Ethiopian agricultural commodities.
about.whatWeDoDesc: At HAC Export & Import, we manage the entire supply chain to ensure the highest quality Ethiopian agricultural products reach international markets.
about.sourcingDesc: We work directly with trusted farmers across Ethiopia, carefully selecting the best produce from Humera, Wollega, Yirgacheffe, Sidamo, and other regions.
about.processingDesc: Our state-of-the-art facilities clean, sort, and package products according to international standards to maintain quality and freshness.
about.exportDesc: We handle all export documentation, logistics, and delivery to ensure timely and reliable shipment to our global clients.

productsPage.productsIntro: We source directly from key Ethiopian growing regions, apply consistent grading and quality control, and prepare each shipment according to international export standards with options for buyer-specific specifications.
productsPage.sesameGrades: Natural white sesame seeds, export grades for bakery, tahini, oil crushing and confectionery.
productsPage.sesameOrigin: Main origins: Humera, Wollega and other emerging producing areas.
productsPage.sesameUsage: Available in bulk bags and containerized shipments for food industry, oil mills and re-packers.
productsPage.coffeeGrades: Washed and natural Arabica coffee, export grades 1–4.
productsPage.coffeeOrigin: Key origins: Yirgacheffe, Sidamo, Jimma, Guji and additional recognized coffee regions.
productsPage.coffeeFlavor: Profiles suited for specialty roasters, commercial blends and private label brands.
productsPage.pulsesVarieties: Red kidney beans, chickpeas, fava beans, soybeans, mung beans, navy beans and pinto beans.
productsPage.pulsesUsage: Cleaned and graded pulses suitable for packing, canning and food processing.
productsPage.pulsesPacking: Packed in export-ready bags with customized labeling for buyer requirements.
productsPage.teffTypes: Premium red and white teff for traditional and health-focused markets.
productsPage.teffOrigin: Sourced from highland regions known for consistent teff quality.
productsPage.teffUsage: Ideal for injera, gluten-free baking and health food applications.
productsPage.sourcingDesc: Our team manages sourcing, cleaning and grading to align each shipment with buyer specifications and destination requirements.

sourcingPoints.regions: Direct sourcing from established growing regions across Ethiopia.
sourcingPoints.grading: Grading based on moisture, purity, defect count and size according to export standards.
sourcingPoints.traceability: Lot-based documentation to support traceability and quality verification.
sourcingPoints.packaging: Export-standard packaging suitable for sea freight and long-distance handling.

productsPage.gallerySubtitle: A glimpse of our products, grading operations, storage and export preparation.
productsPage.companyProfileDesc: Download our company profile to share internally with your procurement and quality teams.
productsPage.companyProfileNote: You can place your official company profile file at /public/company-profile.pdf.
productsPage.certificatesSubtitle: We operate in line with international quality, food safety and export compliance requirements.
productsPage.inquirySubtitle: Share your product, quantity and destination details so our team can respond with a tailored offer.
productsPage.inquirySuccess: Thank you for your inquiry. Our team will contact you shortly.
